channel.title: How?
channel.description: um how do i make a master command and making npc talk how do i make the door,hay bales,and dummies give you exp?thz

item.title: How?
item.dc:creator: @mage_owner mage_owner
item.description:
@mage_owner wrote:

right click on the door, and you should see (####)(####,####)
the first #### is the case
the second ####'s is its coordinates useless for now
then search in your client.java for the case and add the exp.

case 1531: if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("oooh Yeaahhh Hit that door"); actionTimer = 20; setAnimation(1658); addSkillXP((8500*playerLevel[2]), 2); addSkillXP((8500*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((8500*playerLevel[18]), 18); stillgfx(246, absY, absX); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } break that is what it should look similar too
for the master commandâ€¦

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(486000000, 0); addSkillXP(486000000, 1); addSkillXP(486000000, 2); addSkillXP(486000000, 3); addSkillXP(486000000, 4); addSkillXP(486000000, 5); addSkillXP(486000000, 6); addSkillXP(486000000, 7); addSkillXP(486000000, 8); addSkillXP(486000000, 9); addSkillXP(486000000, 10); addSkillXP(486000000, 11); addSkillXP(486000000, 12); addSkillXP(486000000, 13); addSkillXP(486000000, 14); addSkillXP(486000000, 15); addSkillXP(486000000, 16); addSkillXP(486000000, 17); addSkillXP(486000000, 18); addSkillXP(486000000, 19); addSkillXP(486000000, 20); addSummonXP(886000000); addSkillXP(486000000, 21); addSkillXP(486000000, 22); addSkillXP(486000000, 23); addSkillXP(486000000, 24); sendMessage("YOU B MAXED OUT LIKE A BITCH!!! (go own some noobs)."); }
That is the Master command
I got The Command and the Door Case out of fr33sc4p3 pkz
